name: blademaster
desc: Blademasters' Basic Attacks have a chance on hit to trigger two additional attacks against their target. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

name: blaster
desc: Every fourth Basic Attack from a Blast fires additional attacks at random enemies. These addiotional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

name: demolitionist
detail: Damage from Demolitionists' spellcasts stun their targets for 1.50 seconds.

name: infiltrator
desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Infiltrators move to the enemy's backline. Infiltrators gain Attack Speed for 6 seconds at the start of combat.
detail: 40% Bonus Attack Speed. Refreshes on Takedown.
80% Bonus Attack Speed. Refreshes on Takedown.
120% Bonus Attack Speed. Refreshes on Takedown.

name: manareaver
detail: Mana-Reaver's Basic Attacks increase the Mana cost of their target's next spellcast by 40%

name: mercenary
detail: Mercenaries can buy upgrades for their Spells in the shop.

name: paragon
detail: Ally Star Guardian basic attacks are converted to true damage. All other ally basic attacks are converted to magic damage.

name: protector
desc: Protectors shield themselves for 4 seconds whenever they cast a spell. This shield doesn't stack

name: sniper
desc: Snipers deal increased damage for each hex between themselves and their target.

name: sorcerer
desc: All allies have increased Spell Power.

name: starship
detail: Starships gain 40 mana per second, maneuver around the board, and are immune to movement impairing effects, but can't Basic Attack.
